ComicInfo.Title: Hell-Bent & Heaven-Bound, Part Four
ComicInfo.Summary: "Hell-Bent and Heaven Bound," the first arc by the exciting new team of Jason Aaron and Roland Boschi, comes to its explosive conclusion. Ghost Rider has faced off against machine-gun-toting nurses, flesh-rending spirits and hungry cannibals, but has that brought him any closer to an answer in his quest for vengeance? Big things are brewing for Ol' Flamehead in '08, and the madness starts here, with what must surely be the most shocking last page in Ghost Rider history. Hint: He's back!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:11:50. [CVDB130716]
ComicInfo.Editor: Aubrey Sitterson, Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada
ComicInfo.Characters: Ghost Rider (Blaze), Ghost Rider (Ketch), Lucas Collier, Vengeance (Kowalski)
